Rules.InvariantScript:
"data:image/svg+xml;utf8, " & EncodeUrl(
    Substitute(
        "<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='16' height='16' fill='currentColor' class='bi bi-list' viewBox='0 0 16 16'>
  <path fill-rule='evenodd' d='M2.5 12a.5.5 0 0 1 .5-.5h10a.5.5 0 0 1 0 1H3a.5.5 0 0 1-.5-.5m0-4a.5.5 0 0 1 .5-.5h10a.5.5 0 0 1 0 1H3a.5.5 0 0 1-.5-.5m0-4a.5.5 0 0 1 .5-.5h10a.5.5 0 0 1 0 1H3a.5.5 0 0 1-.5-.5'/>
</svg>",
        "currentColor", "Color.AliceBlue"
    )
)

"data:image/svg+xml;utf8, " & EncodeUrl(
    Substitute(
        If(
            cmp_MenuNavbar.CurrentMenuID = ThisItem.MenuID,
            ThisItem.MenuIcon_Selected,
            ThisItem.MenuIcon
        ),
        "currentColor",
        If(
            cmp_MenuNavbar.CurrentMenuID = ThisItem.MenuID,
            cmp_MenuNavbar.SelectedIconColor_text,
            cmp_MenuNavbar.BaseIconColor_Text
        )
    )
)

ControlPropertyState.AutoRuleBindingString: If(Self.Layout = Layout.Horizontal, Min(280, Self.Width - 60), Min(280, Self.Height - 60))

CustomProperties.Name: MenuContent
